definition.value: The healthcare provider involved in the indication for use of the medical device implant.

comment.value: Each occurence of the zib HealthProfessional is normally represented by _two_ FHIR resources: a PractitionerRole resource (instance of [zib-HealthProfessional-PractitionerRole](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-HealthProfessional-PractitionerRole)) and a Practitioner resource (instance of [zib-HealthProfessional-Practitioner](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-HealthProfessional-Practitioner)). The reference to the Practitioner resource is referenced from the PractitionerRole instance. For this reason, sending systems should fill the reference to the PractitionerRole instance here, and not the Practitioner resource. Only in rare circumstances, there is just a Practitioner instance, in which case it is that instance which will be referenced here.
